articles.description: The Fed estimates it will raise the key interest rate to 5.1% in 2023 to curb inflation, more than it previously projected. Economists are skeptical.
articles.content:
Federal Reserve officials last week predicted they'll need to raise interest rates more than they previously planned in 2023 to bring down inflation.
Fed rate hikes increase the cost of borrowing mo… [+6547 chars]
